# Understanding commonly used image file formats



(ref:iris-zoom) Illustration of the key difference between vector graphics and bitmaps. 


```{r iris-zoom, fig.cap='(ref:iris-zoom)'}
knitr::include_graphics("figures/iris_zoom.png")
```


Commonly used image formats are listed in Table \@ref(tab:file-formats).


Table: (\#tab:file-formats) Commonly used image file formats

Acronym   Name                              Type         Application
--------- --------------------------------- ------------ ------------------------
pdf       Portable Document Format          vector       various
eps       Encapsulated PostScript           vector       various
svg       Scalable Vector Graphics          vector       various
png       Portable Network Graphics         bitmap       line drawings
jpeg      Joint Photographic Experts Group  bitmap       photographic images
tiff      Tagged Image File Format          bitmap       line drawings or photographic images
gif       Graphics Interchange Format       bitmap       photographic images, animations
